name: Sword Quest (Futuregames)
description: Get ready to embark on a wonderful adventure! In this game you play as Merlin and Arthur together and you are looking for the legendary sword that Arthur is the rightful inheritor of. There are also people who don’t think you are the rightful inheritor and therefore want to challenge you to battle! Fight them using your best skills with Merlin You want to find the true sword, but there are multiple swords in stones out there, which is then the right one? Get them all with your strength as Arthur A long time ago in a distant land… There was a Mage, Merlin and a child, Arthur. You know this story already. Their story is about the legendary sword in the stone and who it belongs to. And now you get to play your part in this legendary tale. Embark on an adventure right now, just press START!
